pr_title: Fix NPE causing stuck queries in insert returning

timeline.message:
Fix NPE causing stuck queries in insert returning

If there is a failure on an individual item the results are `null` which
caused a NullPointerException in the result collection for `RETURNING`.

An example where the failure happened is if the insert contains a
duplicate primary key.

timeline.bodyText: do we need more than 2 iterations? couldn't this be tested by adding a duplicate id inside the ids array already?
timeline.author: seut

replies.bodyText: I was thinking of the threshold where jdbc switched to binary streaming to have that covered too - but it's actually already randomized in the PostgresITest setup, so I can fix it to 2 iterations here 👍
replies.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: @seut pushed a fixup. I tried to change it to have duplicate ids in just one request, but then the error doesn't occur. I think it only happens if there is no result rows at all.
replies.author: mfussenegger

timeline.message:
Update jdbc to 42.2.18

Guava is updated as well to avoid a dependeny version conflict with
org.checkerframework:checker-qual
